title: About Lupita
text: Learning HVAC can help homeowners to understand their heating and cooling systems and perform basic maintenance and repairs. This can save them money on repair bills and help them to keep their homes comfortable. With this in mind, Lupita-a mother of 3  decided to enroll in a HVAC trdae school. After 2 long years of hard work and practice she became the only woman technician from her school to graduate. This encouraged her to help families that like her that  live in the windy city of Chicago. Lupita undestands first hand that having your HVAC in an excellent condition year round is the key to surviving harsh winters and hot summers.
